text: Cloud Flash Payment Privacy Policy
1. This policy is applicable to users who register and use the Cloud Flash Pay App (except Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan).
2. This policy is only applicable to China UnionPay Co., Ltd. ("We" or "UnionPay") to operate UnionPay Cloud Flash Pay APP to provide related products and services.
Update date: July 6, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: July 11, 2022
If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions, please contact us through the following contact information:

label: Important
Contact Information

Contact Information

label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: Contact address: APP data support and governance team of Yunli Pay Department, No. 1699, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China

text: This policy will help you understand the following:
■ Collection and use of personal information
■ Personal information security management method
■ Protection and response of user rights
■ Protection of personal information of minors
■ Special reminder of sensitive personal information
■ Special processing rules for cross -border information
■ Cookie and similar technology applications
■ Protection of the personal information of the old users
■ Policy update method
■ appendix
We know the importance of personal information to you, and we will do our best to protect your personal information. Thank you for your trust in us.

We promise that in accordance with the mature security standards of the industry, we will take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information, and try our best to explain and inform you with easy -to -understand text expressions.The terms of major relationships are used to ask your attention in a thick manner.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Take corresponding security measures to protect your personal information and clearly inform the inform.

text: We strongly recommend that you read and fully understand all the contents of this policy before using our service.
We will provide you with cloud flash payment app products and services based on your choice.

This policy is suitable for collecting, used, stored, storage and provides your personal information in the people's Republic of China (for the purpose of this privacy policy, except for Hong Kong, Australia, and Taiwan regions).

If you check "I have read and agree" and confirm the submission, it is deemed that you agree with this policy and authorize us to process your personal information in accordance with the provisions of this policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: If you checked "I have read and agree" and confirmed the submission, it is deemed to agree with this policy.

text: 1. Collection and use of personal information
(1) What information do we collect you
label: First Party Collection Information

text: • Basic information, names, family addresses, phone numbers, occupations, nations, gender, age, nationality.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your basic information, including name, family address, phone number, occupation, ethnic, gender, age, nationality.

text: • ID information issued by relevant government departments, such as ID cards, passports, Taiwan compatriots, driving licenses, military official cards, etc., to conduct real -name management of users.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your ID information for real -name management.

text: • Personal financial identification information, (login password, query password, transaction password, dynamic password, SMS verification code, security problem, card CVN2).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your personal financial identification information.

text: Personal financial identification information is sensitive personal information.
• Biometric information, facial pictures, facial features, dynamic videos, fingerprints.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your biometric information, including facial pictures, facial features, dynamic videos, fingerprints.

text: Biometric information is sensitive personal information.

• Bank card information, such as card issuing bank name, bank card type (debit card, credit card), UnionPay card level (general card, gold card, platinum card, diamond card) or other bank card information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your bank card information.

text: Bank card information is sensitive personal information.

• Payment transaction information, use the transaction information promoted by cloud flash payment, such as transaction amount, transaction time, trading location, merchant name, merchant number, terminal number, acceptance agency, etc.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect information on transactions that you use cloud flash payments, such as transaction amount, transaction time, trading location, etc.

text: Some payment transaction information is sensitive personal information.

• Use information, information about your activities and logs of product use and product use and browsing, such as in service, app, start information (time, place), including browsing historical records, search historical records, collection records, software use, software useRecords, product interaction, collapse information, performance and other diagnostic information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect information about your activities and product use and browsing logs.

text: • Account information, your cloud flash payment account details, including cloud flash payment registration mobile phone number, email address, registered device, account status and registration time.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect details of your cloud flash payment account.

text: GUID, SIM card IMSI information, etc., describes information about the basic situation of individuals.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect data that can be used to identify your device.

text: • Location information, accurate location, general location, IP address.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your location information.

text: Accurate location information is sensitive personal information.
• Other information you provide to us, such as the interactive content you submitted through the online customer service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect other information you provide, such as interactive content.

text: • Permanent information, authority information in the device, including address book information, location information, camera, mobile phone album, etc.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect the permission information in your device.

Edit/Control
rewrite: Privacy management through "Settings-Privacy" (IOS system) or "setting-privacy-permissions" (Android system) in the device.

text: (2) The purpose of your personal information

• Support for our services. We will collect the necessary personal information to support our services. The collected information may be used for the improvement of product or service, for auditing or data analysis.Diagnosis, etc.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collecting the necessary personal information to provide support for services, such as internal purposes such as product or service improvement, auditing or data analysis, or for fault diagnosis.

text: • Processing your payment transactions to complete payment. For example, we need to collect your identity information, and the bank card information will issue a payment instruction to the payment bank.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your information to complete payment.

text: • Communicate with you to carry out marketing of our products and services, such as notifying you to receive discounts, use rights, and participate in draws.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your information for marketing for our products and services.

text: Sometimes we may use personal information to send important notices such as collecting and displaying your real -time payment dynamics.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Use personal information to send important notice, such as displaying real -time payment dynamics.

text: • Security and anti -fraud, in order to ensure the stability of services, while protecting your account property security, preventing losses and preventing fraud.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Use your information for service security and anti -fraud.

text: • Treatment of complaint disputes, in conjunction with the disputes you have during use, such as notifications of judicial requests and consumer rights protection departments.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Use your information to process your disputes during use.

text: • Comply with the law to comply with the application of applicable law -such as anti -money laundering compliance obligations or complying with the requirements of industry supervision reports.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Use your information to obey the law.

text: • Improve services to provide you with smoother and more convenient services.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: In order to provide you with a smoother and convenient service to use your information.

text: For example, analysis software flickering and collapse.
(3) Basic business functions and expansion business functions

Cloud Flash Pay APP is a comprehensive payment application software that integrates bank card functions and management. We mainly provides the basic business functions that you provide around account registration, login, payment, bank card management, query bank discounts, points management, etc.At the same time, you can also use our expansion business functions such as shopping entertainment, wealth management, cloud flash payment applets, etc.
Our collection and use of information will follow the legitimacy foundation expressed in laws and regulations.
label: Usage
Data Security
First Party Collection Information

text: The basic business functions we provide need to rely on the necessary information to run. The necessary information refersWe provide or allow us to collect and use the necessary personal information. If you disagree, you will not be able to use our basic product services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect the personal information necessary for the normal operation of APP basic functional services.

text: For the details of the personal information processing of basic business functions, please refer to attachment 1 for details.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: For details of the personal information processing of basic business functions, please refer to attachment 1 for details.

text: You choose to use the expansion business function provided by the Cloud Flash Pay App, you need to provide or allow us to collect the corresponding personal information for the use of products and services. If you do not agree, do not affect the use of our basic business functions.Function collection details, see Annex II for details.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your active personal information for expanding the use of products and services.

text: Second, the security management method of personal information
1. Storage
• Storage location, in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, we will store your personal information collected and generated during the operation of the people's Republic of China in China.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: The personal information collected and generated in domestic operations will be stored in China.

text: • The storage period, we only retain your personal information within the time limit for the purpose of providing you with the purpose of the cloud flash payment APP product and service or a reasonable period or a reasonable period or a time limit for regulatory regulations. For example, according to the "bank card organization and funds and fundsThe provisions of the Clearance Center Anti -Money Laundering and Anti -Terrorism Financing Guidelines ", after you cancel the user of the Cloud Flash Pay App, we will save your personal identity information for 5 years in accordance with laws and regulations or regulatory regulations.In the core business system, your personal identity information and liquidation business data are preserved for 15 years. After the above -mentioned storage period expires, we will delete or anonymous processing of your personal identity information and transaction information.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: Stay your personal information only within the required and reasonable period of providing services or laws and regulations and the time limit stipulated in regulatory regulations.

text: 2. Safety qualifications

We have obtained the following certification: our core business system has passed the level 4 certification of the information system level protection of the People's Republic of China, and the cloud flash payment business system has passed the third -level certification of the information system level protection of the People's Republic of China.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The core business system has passed the four -level certification of the information system level protection of the People's Republic of China, and the cloud flash payment business system has passed the third -level certification of the information system level protection of the People's Republic of China.

text: Our Cloud Flash Pay APP has obtained a Security Certificate of Mobile Internet Application (APP) issued by the China Network Security Review Technology and Certification Center.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Cloud Flash Pay APP obtained a security certification certificate for mobile Internet applications (APP).

text: 3. Internal management measures

We have adopted a variety of protection methods such as internal management systems and technical guarantee measures to protect your personal information. Specifically, it includes but not limited to:
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Protect your personal information in many aspects of internal management system and technical guarantee measures.

text: • The degree of sensitivity and type of personal information has been adopted, and the classification system is classified, and the authority restrictions are limited to user permissions, use scenarios permissions, use authorization permissions, and hierarchical approval mechanisms according to the classification and classification results.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The classification and grading system is adopted, and permissions restrictions on the user's authority, the authority of the use of the scenario, the authorization authority, and the grading approval mechanism are based on the classification and classification results.

text: • Regular security audit, we use the audit mechanism to conduct a comprehensive verification and control of the effectiveness of privacy policies and related procedures and data security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Through the audit mechanism, the effectiveness of privacy policies and related regulations and data security are comprehensively checked and controlled.

text: • In terms of mechanism guarantee, we have set up a personal information protection team to conduct an evaluation of personal information protection for personal information collection, use, provision, and commission processing.Awareness strengthens publicity and organizes all staff every year to participate in the compliance test.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Carry out the influence evaluation of personal information protection, and train employees to organize compliance examinations.

text: • When you correct, delete your personal information, or cancel your account, your personal information involved in the backup system will be processed in accordance with the requirements of the regulations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: After you correct, delete your personal information or cancel your account, the personal information in the backup system is processed in accordance with regulations.

text: 4. Technical guarantee

• We have developed relevant information security incident emergency plans, and regularly organize internal personnel to conduct emergency response training and emergency drills, so that they can master job duties and emergency disposal strategies and procedures.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Formulate emergency plans for information security incidents, and regularly organize emergency response training and emergency drills.

text: • After unfortunately a personal information security incident, we will inform you in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations: the basic situation and possible impact of security incidents, we have taken the disposal measures we have or will take, you can take it alone to prevent and reduce the riskSuggestions, remedy measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: We will timely inform you that the incident -related situation is promoted by the APP, sending mail/short message, and telephone. When it is difficult to inform the subject of personal information one by one, we will publish a reasonable and effective way.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The relevant situation of security incidents will be informed by mail, letter, telephone, push notification, etc. When it is difficult to inform one by one, it will issue an announcement.

text: At the same time, we will also actively report to the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Report the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.

text: If your legitimate rights and interests are damaged, we will bear the corresponding legal responsibility.
label: Data Security

text: Third, the protection and response of user rights
We guarantee your right to exercise your personal information:
(1) Query and access your personal information

You can access, check your name, ID information (mask), or contact us through the customer service hotline 95516 through the Cloud Flash App, except for the exception stipulated in the laws and regulations.

Edit/Control

(2) Correct your personal information

When you find that we have the wrong personal information about your personal information, you have the right to ask us to make corrections. You can make a need to correct personal information through customer service hotline 95516.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can make a need to correct personal information through customer service hotline 95516.

text: In terms of technical guarantee measures, we adopted it during storage, irreversible encryption storage, isolation storage, and adopted during information display and download, removed the processing, and adopted it during transmission.Data medium isolation transmission, and other technical measures to ensure your personal information security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: During the storage, irreversible encryption storage and isolation storage were taken. During the information display and download, it was identified as a de -identified processing. During transmission, technical measures such as dedicated line transmission, encryption transmission, key and data medium isolation transmission were adopted to ensure individuals to ensure individualsinformation security.

text: Click to view the relevant path.

Edit/Control

text: 4. Protection and protection of personal information of minors
1. Our products, websites and services are mainly for adults.

5. Legality foundation: The legitimate foundation of all the processing links of your personal information under this privacy policy refers to the situation listed in Article 13 of the Personal Information Protection Law.

6. Necessary information: The necessary information refers to the personal information necessary to ensure the normal operation of the basic functional services of the app. Lack of the information app will not be able to achieve basic functional services.
7. Automated decision -making: Refers to automatic analysis through computer programs, evaluating personal behavior habits, hobbies or economic, healthy, credit conditions, etc., and make decisions.
8. Devitization: Refers to the process of personal information processing, so that it cannot recognize the process of specific natural person without using additional information.

1. Personal information refers to the various information related to the recognized or recognizable natural person recorded in electronics or other ways, excluding information after anonymous processing.
9. SDK: Software DEVELOPMENT KIT, software tool development package, a embedded technical tool for providing interfaces or collecting information for a function.
10. Cookies: a technical tool that records user ID, browsing information, and staying for a long time.

11. Web Beacon: The network beacon is a picture of 1 pixel size hidden in any webpage element or email. It is often used to collect data such as online habits of target computer users and write these data into cookies.

12. Registration in the country: For the purpose of this privacy policy, it refers to the registration of mobile phone numbers provided by communication operators in the country (except for Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan regions).
